azureLogAnalytics.query:
let instanceRaw = "${Instance}";
let instanceSelected = case(instanceRaw == "Nexi Oracle", "NDP003PROD", instanceRaw == "Nexi Postgres", "NDP004PROD", instanceRaw == "PagoPA Postgres", "NDP001PROD", "No filter");
dependencies
| extend operationId = tostring(split(operation_Name, " - ")[1])
| where operationId in ("6217ba1b2a92e81fa4f15e79")
| extend faultCode = tostring(customDimensions.faultCode)
| extend outcome = iif(resultCode == "200" and isempty(faultCode), "OK", iif(isempty(faultCode), tostring(resultCode), faultCode))
| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize total = count(), ko = countif(outcome != "OK") by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| extend availability = 1 - todouble(ko) / todouble(total)
| project timestamp, value = availability, series = "Availability"

let instanceRaw = "${Instance}";
let instanceSelected = case(instanceRaw == "Nexi Oracle", "NDP003PROD", instanceRaw == "Nexi Postgres", "NDP004PROD", instanceRaw == "PagoPA Postgres", "NDP001PROD", "No filter");
dependencies
| extend operationId = tostring(split(operation_Name, " - ")[1])
| where operationId in ("6217ba1b2a92e81fa4f15e79")
| extend faultCode = tostring(customDimensions.faultCode)
| extend outcome = iif(resultCode == "200" and isempty(faultCode), "OK", iif(isempty(faultCode), tostring(resultCode), faultCode))
| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1m), outcome
| project timestamp, value = count_, series = outcome

let instanceRaw = "${Instance}";
let instanceSelected = case(instanceRaw == "Nexi Oracle", "NDP003PROD", instanceRaw == "Nexi Postgres", "NDP004PROD", instanceRaw == "PagoPA Postgres", "NDP001PROD", "No filter");
requests
| where operation_Name contains "6217ba1b2a92e81fa4f15e79"
| project timestamp, operation_Id
| join kind=inner (dependencies | project operation_Id, duration, target) on operation_Id
| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize value=avg(duration) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| project timestamp, value, series = "Avg"

let instanceRaw = "${Instance}";
let instanceSelected = case(instanceRaw == "Nexi Oracle", "NDP003PROD", instanceRaw == "Nexi Postgres", "NDP004PROD", instanceRaw == "PagoPA Postgres", "NDP001PROD", "No filter");
requests
| where operation_Name contains "6217ba1b2a92e81fa4f15e79"
| project timestamp, operation_Id
| join kind=inner (dependencies | project operation_Id, duration, target) on operation_Id
| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize value=percentile(duration, 95) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| project timestamp, value, series = "P95"

| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize value=avg(duration) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| project timestamp, value, series = "Avg"

let instanceRaw = "${Instance}";
let instanceSelected = case(instanceRaw == "Nexi Oracle", "NDP003PROD", instanceRaw == "Nexi Postgres", "NDP004PROD", instanceRaw == "PagoPA Postgres", "NDP001PROD", "No filter");
requests
| where operation_Name contains "61dedafb2a92e81a0c7a58f5"
| project timestamp, operation_Id
| join kind=inner (dependencies | project operation_Id, duration, target) on operation_Id
| extend backend = case (target startswith "https://weuprod.nodo.internal.platform.pagopa.it/nodo", "NDP001PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.34", "NDP003PROD", target startswith "https://10.79.20.25", "NDP004PROD", "Unknown")
| where iif(instanceSelected == "No filter", true, backend == instanceSelected)
| summarize value=percentile(duration, 95) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| project timestamp, value, series = "P95"
